chapters.title: Chapter 6: A Stave and a Razor
chapters.info: Jain Farstrider, p. 193—Hero of legend. There is a book about him, The Travels of Jain Farstrider, that Mat intends to read but never has. The book is quite popular with his friends, including Elayne, Egwene, Rand, and Nynaeve. See also Charin, Jain.
